messages.title: About me:
messages.content: I have lived in the area for 5 years, working on the family farm. I have come to love Moorlands and its people. I am not a career politician; I have not been groomed for Government. I am not part of the Oxbridge establishment. . I am a real person, a working man, I have struggled to pay bills and I know the price of a pint of Milk and I will do what I can to SERVE the people of Moorlands.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A free health service for British citizens, with less bureaucratic middle management and more frontline services.
Ending overdevelopment and endless wind turbine building.
No tax on the minimum wage and reducing tax on middle earners.
We should leave the EU, securing our borders, preserving our sovereignty and 'de-regulating' our Small Businesses.
Free Grammar schools for every town, ensuring better education for our children, regardless of background.
In Localism, and real democracy, where your voice will be heard.
In freeing farmers from endless legislation, allowing them to be farmers again.

issues.brexitEurope: We should leave the EU, securing our borders, preserving our sovereignty and 'de-regulating' our Small Businesses.
issues.economy: No tax on the minimum wage and reducing tax on middle earners. 'De-regulating' our Small Businesses.
issues.education: Free Grammar schools for every town, ensuring better education for our children, regardless of background.
issues.environment: Ending overdevelopment and endless wind turbine building.
issues.health: A free health service for British citizens, with less bureaucratic middle management and more frontline services.
issues.immigration: We should leave the EU, securing our borders.
